sentences.english: Lake Greenery heavy, rich in moose, black bear, flying squirrels, and Diver.
sentences.chinese: 湖畔绿茵重重，盛产驼鹿，黑熊，飞鼠和潜鸟。

sentences.english: ‘Common Loon’” he reads. “It looks like a duck.”
sentences.chinese: 普通潜鸟”他读着，“看上去像鸭子。”
